Description:
Detects usage of the "Add-WindowsCapability" cmdlet to add Windows capabilities. Notable capabilities could be "OpenSSH" and others.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Add Windows Capability Via PowerShell Cmdlet
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and command like '%add-windowscapability%' and command like '%openssh.%')
